short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight selected areas you want to focus on
short.zh_CN: 高亮显示您想要关注的选定区域

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spotlight plugin: allows users to select an element that forms a spotlight area and dims the background outside the element. And it can adjust the blur and darkness of the background.
long.zh_CN: 聚光灯插件：让用户能选择一个元素， 在该元素形成聚光区域，元素外的背景调暗。并且可以调节背景的模糊度、暗度。
